forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of rain showers and patchy fog. Cloudy, with a low around 64. South wind around 5 mph. Chance of precipitation is 50%.

forecast.name: Wednesday
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of rain showers and patchy fog before 3pm. Mostly cloudy, with a high near 80. South wind 5 to 8 mph. Chance of precipitation is 50%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

weather_report:
As the city of Boston slumbers beneath a veil of cloud and moisture, the atmosphere hangs heavy with the promise of rain showers that may grace the onset of the day. The night is cool, the air laden with the scent of impending precipitation and soft whispers of patchy fog. As morning unfurls, it brings a persistent cloak of clouds and the lingering chance of a graceful sprinkle, tumbling gently before the afternoon sun can pierce through.

Indeed, the day ahead hints at a touch of warmth, with expectations of temperatures climbing modestly—balmy yet tempered. As you step out, consider wrapping yourself in light and breathable fabrics, layered just enough to ward off the cool tang of the breeze. Footsteps on the damp pavement may guide you; a leisurely stroll through the nearby parks could offer moments of reflection, punctuated by the laughter of fellow Bostonians and the soft rustle of leaves. Or perhaps an exploration of quaint coffee shops will provide solace, where you can savor the comforting embrace of a warm beverage, contemplating the rhythm of the day. As the sun tries to break through later, the world may feel just a bit more alive, energized by the gentle promise of summer that is only just beginning to unfold.
